channel.title: General Television Lost Entertainment Addiction on Writing by Harper Reed
channel.description: Recent content in General Television Lost Entertainment Addiction on Writing by Harper Reed

item.title: Watching Lost.
item.description: Everyone at worked has been talking about Lost incessantly since I started working at skinnyCorp. It was driving me mad - mostly because they kept talking about all sorts or interesting things. Things that didn't make sense and it was completely infuriating. I was completely taken in, without even seeing or knowing anything about it. The final straw was the alternative reality game the Lost people put on. It was absolutely madness.
